title: [Health] Gut Microbiome Implicated in Healthy Aging and Longevity. Researchers have identified distinct signatures in the gut microbiome that are associated with either healthy or unhealthy aging trajectories, which in turn predict survival in a population of older individuals.

[Health] Scientists develop new biosensing device to chemically monitor the state of muscles during physical exercise. It will help optimize training of athletes and exercise routines of rehabilitation patients and the elderly, as well as control the exertion of high-performance workers such as firefighters.
